name: The Z'ECRET beta
description:
The Z'ECRET is a first-person puzzle/adventure game with low-poly style graphics but beautiful visuals.
The game has a meaningful message about life, represented in a metaphorical world that includes a forest, a maze, and an ocean.
The player can explore these beautiful places, find the mails of a mysterious person, and solve puzzles that help you find your way out of the maze.
